GeneDef.label: Curse Energy
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a reserve of biological strength powered by a resource called hemogen. The resource can be gained and spent in various ways, all of which are unlocked by other genes.\n\nCarriers lose 2 hemogen per day from biological entropy.
GeneDef.resourceDescription: A sinister and potent force originating from malevolent spirits, utilized by sorcerers for combat and exorcism but posing grave danger to both wielders and targets alike
